description.value: You can mix a blend of crushed flowers and alchemical salt into an alchemical elixir with the healing trait or alchemical food. Choose one of the following effects: reduce the drained condition by 1, reduce the stupefied condition by 1, remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] condition, or remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] condition. The creature who consumes the modified healing elixir or alchemical food gains this benefit in addition to the food or elixir's normal effects. This has no effect against permanent conditions.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
